home.title: Simple and faster PDF transfer
home.subtitle: Send your file easily and securely

success.elon_musk: Even Elon Musk won't be able to see it!

simple.title: Simple and fast
simple.text: Just drop your pdf anywhere on the page and get a link to share. No more struggles with sending big pdf files by email, we make it easier and faster.

security.title: End-to-End Encryption
security.text: Privacy is very important for us, so we choose to provide an end-to-end encrypted way to share your sensitive files. They are only accessible by you and the receiver.

ecolo.title: Carbon neutral
ecolo.text: No more attachment saved ad vitam aeternam!

open_source.title: Open source project
open_source.text: We value knowledge sharing and we encourage collaboration. Our focus is to provide a cool and useful pdf sharing service for the community, that's why it's an open-source project.

expiration.title: Automatic expiration
expiration.text: All uploaded files are permanently deleted once they reached their expiration date. If you no longer need those files, you can remove them permanently by yourself.

upload.input: Upload or drop your PDF here and get a shareable link!

errors.wrong_file_type: Wrong file type: only PDF files are allowed!

upload_failed.title: An error occured
upload_failed.description: Cannot upload your file. Please retry or contact us!
